test.name: Scenario: Verify display of error messages upon submitting null data in contact page

kw.name: Given I am in Jupiter Toys Homepage
Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: I open browser and navigate to URL
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'chrome' to base url 'https://jupiter.cloud.planittesting.com/#'.

kw.name: Location Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL contains ``expected``.
kw.msg: Current location contains 'https://jupiter.cloud.planittesting.com/#'.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: When I go to Contact page
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking link 'css:a[href="#/contact"]'.

kw.name: Location Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL contains ``expected``.
kw.msg: Current location contains 'https://jupiter.cloud.planittesting.com/#/contact'.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking link 'css:a.btn-contact'.

kw.name: Then Error messages for required fields should be displayed
Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Forename is required'.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Email is required'.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'We welcome your feedback'.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text '- but we won't get it unless you complete the form correctly'.

test.name: Scenario: Validate error message for wrong email format

kw.name: Given I am in Contact page
Location Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL contains ``expected``.
kw.msg: Current location contains 'https://jupiter.cloud.planittesting.com/#/contact'.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: When I input data in required fields
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Planit test' into text field 'css:input#forename'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'test message only' into text field 'css:textarea#message'.

kw.name: And Email address is not in correct format
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'invalid email format' into text field 'css:input#email'.

kw.name: Then Email address format error should be displayed
Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Please enter a valid email'.

test.name: Scenario: Validate error messages are gone after inputting correct data on required fields

kw.name: Given I am in Contact page
Location Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL contains ``expected``.
kw.msg: Current location contains 'https://jupiter.cloud.planittesting.com/#/contact'.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: When I input correct data in all required fields
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Planit test' into text field 'css:input#forename'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'test@test.com' into text field 'css:input#email'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'test message only' into text field 'css:textarea#message'.

kw.name: Then Error messages should not be displayed
Page Should Not Contain
kw.doc: Verifies the current page does not contain ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page does not contain text 'Forename is required'.

kw.name: Page Should Not Contain
kw.doc: Verifies the current page does not contain ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page does not contain text 'Email is required'.

kw.name: Page Should Not Contain
kw.doc: Verifies the current page does not contain ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page does not contain text 'Message is required'.
